--- create_index_storing.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  bar asc
) storing (foo, baz)

--- AST
&parser.CreateIndex{
  pos:          0,
  end:          60,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  Name:         &parser.Ident{
    pos:  13,
    end:  20,
    Name: "foo_bar",
  },
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  24,
    end:  27,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Keys: []*parser.IndexKey{
    &parser.IndexKey{
      end:  39,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  32,
        end:  35,
        Name: "bar",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
  },
  Storing: &parser.Storing{
    pos:     42,
    end:     60,
    Columns: []*parser.Ident{
      &parser.Ident{
        pos:  51,
        end:  54,
        Name: "foo",
      },
      &parser.Ident{
        pos:  56,
        end:  59,
        Name: "baz",
      },
    },
  },
  InterleaveIn: (*parser.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (bar ASC) STORING (foo, baz)
